alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Greensville; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 4:29PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN NORTHAMPTON... SOUTHERN GREENSVILLE...SOUTHEASTERN MECKLENBURG AND SOUTHERN BRUNSWICK COUNTIES... At 428 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Norlina, or 10 miles north of Warrenton, moving east at 40 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with this storm. This storm will be near... Ebony around 445 PM EDT. Brunswick and Gasburg around 455 PM EDT. Barley around 510 PM EDT. Roanoke Rapids and Gaston around 515 PM EDT. Garysburg around 520 PM EDT. Dahlia around 525 PM EDT. Seaboard and Claresville around 530 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Ante, Brink, Beechwood, Gum Forks, Triplet, Lanes Corner, Bowens Corner, Henrico, White Plains and Vultare. If you are on or near Lake Gaston, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
